feature_model.name: increment and decrement
feature_model.feature_tree: :r increment and decrement (f_increment_and_decrement) :m Isolation (f_Isolation) :m Integral (f_Integral) :m QoS (f_QoS) :m termination integral (f_termination_integral) :m range problem (f_range_problem) :m reference workload (f_reference_workload) :m general termination (f_general_termination) :g [1, *] : always take lower value (f_always_take_lower_value) : take closer one (f_take_closer_one)
